description: R17 Release. Decouples R-Number from Date (Global Epoch Rule).

CORE.STATEMENT: Never compress, aggregate, average, or summarize structured input data unless explicitly ordered.
Version numbers must always increment. The R-Number (Epoch) is GLOBAL and NEVER RESETS, even if the date changes.
All baseline changes must follow the 4-step revision procedure.
Any architectural change must be output as a complete, downloadable JSON file. Never output raw code snippets for governance.
The Registry R-Number is independent of the Date. It is a continuous counter of system states.

DECOUPLED_COUNTERS_BP112.LOGIC: Date = When it happened. R-Number = What iteration this is. They move independently.

CORE.STATEMENT: Thread Health Monitor status must be provided in all major responses.

revision_notes.reason_for_revision: R17 Upgrade. Added BP-112 and clarified L002 to prevent Epoch Resets.
